title: E54 THE ANNIVERSARY EPISODE
description:
WELCOME TO THE ONE-YEAR ANNIVERSARY EPISODE! Thank you all for helping us get this far. We couldn’t do any of this without you And we’ve got a special surprise for you! But you’re going to have to listen to find out. 
Come meet us at CrimeCon 2018 in Nashville, TN! Get a surprise gift from us when you use our promo code “ATWWD” to get 10% off your order! https://www.crimecon.com/
Please consider supporting the companies that support us! 
Hello Fresh - Use promo code DRINK30 for $30 off your first week of Hello Fresh! 
Havenly - Get 25% off your design package by visiting havenly.com/drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
